turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two medium pepperoni pizzas with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium thick crust pizzas, both pepperoni is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me know when they'll be ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, order and just let me know when they are ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
